text: [A] [(1) Put a ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: Character from your Waiting Room to the bottom of your Clock] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 Level 1 or lower Character in your Waiting Room, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[C] If all of your Characters are ::Date:: or ::Elemental::, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] CX COMBO When "Black and White Facing Off" is placed to your Climax Zone and you have another ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: Character, for the turn this gains the following 2 abilities. "[C] The Character Opposite this cannot move to another Slot, cannot be Sent to Memory, and cannot be returned to hand." "[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may choose a ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand."

[C] For each of your other Back Row Character with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental:: this gains +1000 Power.
[C] [Clock] ALARM If this is on the top of your Clock, you are Level 2 or higher, and you have 4 or more Characters with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental::, this gains the following ability. "[S] [(2) Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] Place this to any Slot on your Stage, put the top card of your Library to Clock."
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage or via the effect of [S] of "Kurumi, Black-Clothed Spirit" to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.

[A] During the turn this is placed from hand to the Stage, at the start of your Encore Step, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "Zafkiel" is in your Climax Zone, for the turn this gains +1000 Power and the following ability. "[A] [(2) Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] At the end of this card's Attack, you may pay cost. If so, choose a card in your Clock and deal X Damage to your Opponent. X equals the Level of that card + 1." (Climax Cards are considered Level 0. Damage Cancel can occur)

[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: Characters, and for the turn that Character gains +1500.
[A] [Clock] ALARM If this is on the top of your Clock, at the beginning of your Opponent's Climax Phase, for the turn all of your Characters with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental:: gain the following ability. "[A] [Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is Front Attacked, you may pay cost. If so, for the turn this gains +2000 Power."

[A] When a Climax with a Choice Trigger Icon is placed in your Climax Zone, for the turn all of your Characters gain +500 Power.
[S] CX COMBO BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each "Zafkiel" and/or "Black and White Facing Off" revealed this way, choose up to 1 Character in your Waiting Room, return it to your hand, choose 1 of your Characters and for the turn that Character gains +1000 Power.

[C] All your other Characters with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental:: gain +500 Power.
[A] [(1) Put the top card of your Library in your Clock] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 '"Zafkiel" Kurumi', reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.
[S] RESONANCE [Reveal a '"Zafkiel" Kurumi' from your hand, Rest this] Choose a card in your Clock and return it to hand, choose a card in your hand and place it to Clock.

[C] RECOLLECTION On your turn, if you have a card in Memory, this gains +2500 Power and the following ability. "[A] When this attacks, if the Character Opposite this is Level 2, for the turn this gains +6000 Power."

[A] When this goes from the Stage to the Waiting Room, look at up to the top 4 cards of your Library, choose up to 1 YELLOW Climax, reveal it to your Opponent, add it to your hand, and put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room. If you added a card to your hand, choose 1 card from your hand and discard it to the Waiting Room.
[S] [Put this in the Waiting Room] Choose 1 of your ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: Characters and for the turn that Character gains +2000 Power.

[C] ASSIST All your Level 3 or higher Characters in front of this gain +2000 Power.
[S] [Rest this] Choose a Character with ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: in your Waiting Room and place it to the top or bottom of your Clock. If a card is placed in this way, at the end of your turn, put the bottom card of your Clock to the Waiting Room.

[C] For each of your other Characters with "Kurumi" and/or "Hibiki" in name, this gains +500 Power.
[A] [(1)] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, your Opponent places all of their Stock in their Waiting Room, then puts the same number of cards from the top of their Library to Stock.

[A] [Return 2 Characters from your Waiting Room to your Library, shuffle your Library] When this is placed from hand to the stage, you may pay cost. If so, for the turn, this can Side Attack without Soul penalty.
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: Characters, and for the turn that Character gains +1500 Power.

[A] [(1) Discard a Climax card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a Climax card in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is higher than the Level of your Opponent, you may put that Character in Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters and return it to hand.
[A] [(1) Send this to Memory] When this becomes Reversed in battle, you may pay cost. If so, choose a '"Lucifugus" White Queen' in your Waiting Room and put it Rested in the Slot this was in.

[C] RECOLLECTION If "Sawa, Memories that Never Fade" is in your Memory, this gains +2000 Power and the following ability. "[A] [(1)] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, perform Trigger Check twice during this attack's Trigger Step.
[S] [(1) Send this Standing card to Memory] Choose up to 1 '"Zafkiel" Kurumi' in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[C] You may play your Climax cards without meeting the color requirement.
[C] All your other Characters with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental:: gain +500 Power.

[A] [Clock] SHIFT Level 0
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 1500, Level 1 [Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] If your Opponent has an ::Cat:: Character, this cannot attack.
[C] RECOLLECTION If "Kurumi, Memories That Never Fade" is in your Memory, this gains +3000 Power.
[C] RECOLLECTION If "Sawa, Memories That Never Fade" is in your Memory, this gains the following ability. "[A] [(1) When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, perform Trigger Check twice during this attack's Trigger Step."

[A] This ability activates up to twice per turn. When your Character card is placed from hand in Clock, this gains +3000 Power for the turn.
[A] ENCORE [Discard a Character card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] When you use the BACKUP of this, choose 1 of your Characters in battle, and that Character gains the following ability for the turn. "[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, send that Character to your Opponent's Memory."
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 3000, Level 2 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] During your turn, if you have 2 or more other Characters with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental::, this gains +4000 Power.
[A] [Clock] Alarm If this is on top of your Clock, and you have a ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: Character, at the beginning of your Climax Phase, choose 1 of your Characters, and for the turn that Character gains the following ability. "[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may put that Character to your Opponent's Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock to their Waiting Room."

You may put a card from your hand to the bottom of your Clock. If you do, search your Library for up to 2 Characters with "Kurumi" in name, show them to your Opponent, put them in your hand, and shuffle your Library.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "Memories Collide" is in your Climax Zone and you have 2 or more other Characters with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental::, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 Character with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental:: from among them, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, discard the remaining cards to the Waiting Room, choose 1 of your Characters with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental::, and for the turn that Character gains +1500 Power.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage or via effect of [A] ability of your "Hibiki, Fleeting Joint Struggle" to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "Lucifugus" is in your Climax Zone and you have 2 or more other Characters with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental::, choose and perform 1 of the following 2 effects. "Choose up to 2 cards in your Opponent's Waiting Room, return them to their Library, your Opponent Shuffles their Library, and for the turn this gains +2 Soul." "You may put the top 2 cards of your Stock to the Waiting Room. If you do, Deal 2 Damage to your Opponent." (Damage Cancel can occur)

[A] [(2)] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters and move it to another empty Slot on your Opponent's Stage.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, choose up to 1 Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[C] All of your other Characters with "White Queen" in name gain the following ability. "[[A] Put a Character in Memory with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental:: into your Waiting Room] At the beginning of your Opponent's Attack Phase you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your other Characters with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental:: and this card, Stand and Swap them."
[C] All of your other Level 0 and Lower Characters gain +500 Power and the following ability. "[A] When this is Reversed in Battle, if you have 2 or less Characters in Memory, you may Send this to Memory."

[C] If there are 2 or fewer Climax cards in your Waiting Room, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[C] If you have 2 or more other Characters with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental::, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, draw up to 2 cards, and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room.

[C] If this is on the Stage, this gains ::Doll::.
[C] All of your other Level 0 or lower Characters gain "[A] ENCORE [Discard a Character from hand to the Waiting Room".
[S] [Rest 2 of your Characters with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental::] Choose 1 of your Characters and for the turn that Character gains +2000 Power.

[A] [Discard a Climax from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.
[A] [Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from Stage to the Waiting Room you may pay cost. If so, choose a "Kurumi, Memories That Never Fade" or "Sawa, Memories That Never Fade" in your Waiting Room and return it to hand.

[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: Characters, and for the turn that Character gains +1500.
[A] [(1)] When this is placed from the Stage to either the Waiting Room or Memory, if all of your Characters are ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental::, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 "Yui, Kunoichi", place it Rested to any Slot on your Stage, and Shuffle your Library.

[C] Your other Character with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental:: in your Front Row Center Slot gains +1000 Power.
[A] When your Character Triggers a Climax with a Treasure Trigger Icon, you may draw a card. If so, choose a card from your hand and discard it to the Waiting Room.

[S] [(1)] If you have 2 or fewer cards in your Memory, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 Character with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental:: from among them, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room, and send this to Memory.

[C] RECOLLECTION If "Sawa, Memories that Never Fade" is in your Memory, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] [(1) Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 ::Date:: or ::Elemental:: Character, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[C] This gets -1 Level while on the Stage.
[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, if there is a Climax in your Climax Zone, you may put the top card of your Library to Stock.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose a Character in your Opponent's Front Row, and that Character gets -1000 Power for the turn.
[A] [Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage you may pay cost. If so, choose a Character with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental:: from your Clock, return it to hand, and put the top card of your Library into your Clock.

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +500 Power.
[S] [(2) Rest this] Search your Library your up to 1 Character with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental::, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and Shuffle your Library.
[C] You cannot play Events or BACKUP from hand.
[A] At the beginning of your Climax Phase, your Opponent may put the top 2 cards of their Stock in the Waiting Room. If they do, for the turn, this cannot Front Attack.

[C] RECOLLECTION If there is a card in your Memory, this gains +3000 Power.
[A] [Discard a Climax with a Treasure Trigger Icon from hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, for the turn this gains +1500 Power and the following ability. "[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may draw a card."

[C] This gets -1 Level while on the Stage.
[C] During your turn this gains +4000 Power.

[C] If this is on the Stage, this gets -1 Level and gains ::Doll::.
[C] For each of your other Level 0 or lower Characters, this gains +500 Power.

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.
[A] When your Character Triggers a Climax with a Treasure Trigger Icon, you may draw 2 cards. If so, choose 2 cards in your hand and discard them to the Waiting Room.

[C] For each of your other Back Row Characters with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental::, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] [(1) Rest 1 of your other Standing Characters with ::Date:: or ::Elemental::] During the turn this is placed from hand to the Stage, when the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 Character with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental::, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and Shuffle your Library.

[C] This gets -2 Level while on the Stage.
[A] When this is placed from the hand to the Stage, choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters, and until the next end of your Opponent's turn, that character gains the following ability. "[C] This cannot be moved to another Slot."
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is higher than the Level of the Opponent, you may put the top card of your Opponent's Clock in the Waiting Room. If so, put that Character in Clock.

[C] This gets -2 Level while on the Stage.
[A] RECOLLECTION When this attacks, if you have 2 or more Characters with ::Date:: and/or ::Elemental:: in Memory, for the turn this gets +X Power. X equals the Level of the Character Opposite this times 2000.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
